text: Professional approach! I finally found an excellent dermatologist. I am in the middle of acne treatment. After four months, I see a clear improvement - acne lesions are gradually disappearing. During each visit, she assesses the progress of treatment, the impact of medications on health and well-being. She analyzes blood test results and issues appropriate recommendations. Every visit takes place in a friendly atmosphere.
Empathy, professionalism, holistic approach to the patient. A wonderful person and doctor!

None of the performed procedures brought any effect. The skin lesion, which the doctor treated with a laser as harmless, turned out to be a cancerous change. I have already had the tissue surgically removed - tests show that I had more luck than sense, and I am glad that I did not give up on the topic. Warts are still being treated, and after the visit, instead of one lesion, I have them on almost every finger of both hands.

The doctor dispelled my doubts about one unsightly change that worried me and about which other doctors were not so sure. She told me a lot about it, but she drew attention to another mole, which turned out to need removal in the near future. You can feel the certainty of her own knowledge and experience with the doctor, you trust such a person. I warmly recommend and thank you.
